Description: It’s hard to let this one go, but I’m saving up for a LP Custom. This PRS dates to 1999. 22 frets, but I don’t have the hang tag so can’t tell you if it’s a Custom 22 or Standard 22. Nice metallic silver finish with a very fine sparkle to it. All original except for the strap pins, these were replaced with chrome Dunlop strap locks. This guitar has been played quite a bit but is in pretty good shape. There are 4 small dings in the clearcoat, one by the input jack, one on the upper side of the headstock near the low E tuner, one on the upper edge, and one on the lower horn. None go through to the wood. There is also some pitting on the bridge and pickup covers. Just set up with Ernie Ball 10’s by Tone Tailors in Lititz, PA. Includes original case, which does have some nicks but no structural issues. Latches, locks, and handle fully functional. Auction also includes Silver sparkle leather strap with strap lock pins, truss rod wrench, tremolo bar, and case keys. TERMS AND CONDITIONS Please all questions prior to bidding as all sales are final and items are sold as is. I have done my best to describe condition of item as accurately and honestly as possible. Shipping will be to U.S.A. only, fully insured for amount of winning bid. No international sales, sorry. If you have less than 10 positive feedback please contact me prior to bidding. I reserve the right to cancel any bids if you don’t meet this feedback history or fraud is suspected. Guitar is listed on other sites, so I reserve the right to end the auction early if it sells elsewhere. By bidding, you agree to all terms in this listing. Thanks and good luck! On Nov-20-18 at 04:17:54 PST, seller added the following information: EDIT: Was recently told that this is most likely a Standard 22 since there is no masked wood binding around the front edge. Did not verify this with PRS but wanted to share that info.On Nov-27-18 at 15:55:56 PST, seller added the following information: Confirmed with PRS that this is a 1999 Standard 22 in Platinum Metallic with mahogany body and neck, Indian rosewood fingerboard, dragon 2 pickups. Also, tons of questions about shipping. Seems the calculator is giving some really high numbers. I will only charge actual cost to ship. Will ship UPS or USPS, your call. If you want to check actual shipping cost, box weighs 25.6 lbs and measures 52”x20”x8”.
Title: Paul Reed Smith 1999 PRS Custom 22 Silver Metallic with Tremolo and Birds
